text: You are a deterministic PII extractor. Always reply with STRICT JSON: {"items":[{"text":str,"start":int,"end":int,"label":str}]}. Labels allowed: PERSON, ORG, GPE, LOC, DATE, EMAIL, PHONE, IBAN, CREDIT_CARD, AGE, GENDER, OTHER. Offsets are zero-based and refer to the exact substring in the provided text. Do not invent values; if nothing is found return {"items":[]} only.
Contact Sarah Lopez via sarah.lopez@health.example or call +1-415-555-0199 before 2024-11-05.
The internal memo summarized quarterly performance and mentioned no customer data.
